law.catch_line: The Secretary may refuse to issue a license or may suspend or revoke a license for:...
law.text:
The Secretary may refuse to issue a license or may suspend or revoke a license for:
Fraudulent or deceptive statements on an application for a license;
Failure to comply with any of the provisions of this subtitle or the rules or regulations adopted pursuant to it; or
Failure to maintain adequate insurance on all grain received into the physical control or possession of the grain dealer.
